website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for dorms, small bathrooms, or travel.
pros: Four large pockets and four small pockets organize your toiletries
You can attach to your shower curtain rings or use included hooks to hang
cons: A bit bulky when pockets are full

customer_reviews.title: and I really like it. I installed a shower rod along the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a shower caddy, and I really like it. I installed a shower rod along the back of the space and hung this from it. It is well constructed, with good strong seams at the edges. The mesh is tighter than I expected, but still lets water flow out of it quickly. It looks like it should last a while. The hooks can be turned square side up for use over a door.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something simple to keep everything off the sides of the tub, as they kept falling and I didn't like having to reach down and get hit in the face with water anytime I wanted my shampoo/conditioner. It's nice and makes the whole shower area look neater. Bonus Cat included in second photo.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it ! Great organizer for any room
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find anything this sturdy and affordable hanging mesh pockets anywhere! Good quality hold heavy items well and easy to set up. Love this in my bathroom. Also just make sure you keep it clean because it's white can stain easily
customer_reviews.author: Jessica stawicki

customer_reviews.title: and none had great reviews. I was pleasantly surprised to find it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about ordering this, because there are several options on Amazon, and none had great reviews. I was pleasantly surprised to find it works exactly how I needed it to, and has held up for many months. I have used it hanging on my shower rod for about 6 months now, and it has held up great. It hasn't torn, developed mildew, or anything like that. It is perfect for holding all of my shower items. The pockets are perfectly sized and the pockets are strong enough for all of my items.
customer_reviews.author: HelloReese

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it took me so long to find this after many failed shower caddys and hooks. I'm never looking back! It hold so many items and is very sturdy!! And slides on my rod right along with my curtain. I still can't believe it holds my big Sams sized bottle of Body wash. Been there for 3 months with no rips or tears. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: C. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Pockets ripped the first time I tried it
customer_reviews.text: I was literally placing my items into the pockets before even thinking about hanging it since I was concerned that they may not be big enough for my hair dryer and products. One of the pockets seams unraveled completely and the plastic mesh ends were showing immediately after making it impossible for me to use now. I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Two months later still going strong! This thing is solid and strong and we love it! Buy this one guys! Original: Love this thing! Replaced my old mesh one and there is no comparison. Holds its shape, super sturdy and well made. Multiple sized compartments. Holds my squeegee, hair brush, two razors, shaving gel, shampoo and conditioners and it seems like there's room for even more! FYI the hardware it comes with is for hanging over a door. The hardware is not intended to be used to hang it in your shower. Just add it to your current shower curtain rings and you are good to go! Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Arvis Jaggamar

customer_reviews.title: Shower Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use in my camper. I bought a tension rod and used shower curtain hooks to hang it from the rod and it works great! I didn't want to fool with suctions cups or anything like that because I didn't think it would hold well enough to withstand all the bumps going down the road. The tension rod is right above the lip of the shower unit so it has a little extra support and it's never budged even with several full size shampoo/conditioner bottles and travel size items. I also like that it has the extra spot for razors. This set up has worked perfectly for us.
customer_reviews.author: tigersroar

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for the quality, but serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot smaller than expected. Appears cheap when you first see it. Something you'd probably see at the dollar store. The stitching bothered me the most because it's messy and somewhat uneven. However, I do like that the mesh has micro holes so water can run through it. Once I put this up against my white shower curtain, I can't really tell and it serves its very simple purpose. I think it's overpriced though.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Excellent qulity  .  .  .
customer_reviews.text: I've not had this long enough to break in yet. I'm not using the over-the-door hangers, as I have it attached to a dowel-type towel rack. The mesh fabric of this organizer seems especially good quality -- not too "saggy." I have to jerry rig things to fit my needs in this old New England farm house. Fun, fun. Anyway, this seems like a very good product and not terribly expensive. [I have since bought a 2nd one, different style, but a MISSLO. Can't seem to go wrong with this brand. And both arrived in just a few days after ordering.]
customer_reviews.author: Rose39

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: So I initially bought the Command metal shower caddy (I used it in the past and it worked great) but after it fell down twice at my new house I realized it was not going to work. I was looking for something cheap but durable and this fit the bill! I hooked it directly onto the shower curtain rod and was able to store 4 decent size bottles plus my face wash and razor with room to spare. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I purchased this item!!!! This is exactly what I needed in my shower. I hated how messy my shower always looked with all the shampoos and soaps all over the place. I was able to put all soaps and shampoos in it and now my tub is clean and nice. There’s enough pockets too for my whole family. So each of us have our own pocket for our soaps and shampoo! :) Id definitely get this item again and recommend it to others! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: JMendiola

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The shower was getting quite clogged up with various shampoo and soap bottles. I started to look for an organizer and this one seemed decent. I was right. It's been nearly a year I think, and no problems whatsoever. Very sturdy material, almost all the bottles I have stored in it now are the extra large variety. The mesh dries quickly between everyones shower, and a quick wipe down will suffice. I did choose to hang it on the wall with some Command strips, and that seems to have been a great way to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole B.

customer_reviews.title: Caddy Say What
customer_reviews.text: My shower is super small but has a bar in the back of it (yeah I dunno why). The shower nozzle is not sturdy enough for a caddy so I got this bad boy right here. I have 3 bottles of shampoo/conditioner, 1 bottle of body wash, 1 can of shaving cream, razor, and blades in this thing. There's still a couple pockets I don't use. It's so convenient and really doesn't even get wet in my shower. Worth every penny for this hanging thing. Can't say anything about the suction bit because I didn't even bother since my shower has individual tiles that I don't trust with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Ripped within a few months.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were looking for a mesh shower hanger for our claw foot tub. This item is really nice and has a very slim profile. All the different compartments are very helpful and the material doesn't seem to retain odor/mildew like some of the other ones we've tried. The only downside was that it ripped after only having it for a short time, but the company was extremely responsive in fixing our issues! Their customer service was excellent and they sent us a new product right away.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon and Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my bathroom shower. There are no places to put shampoos or soaps in our camper shower. I thought about suction cup shelves but those never hold up. This hangs on the shower curtain rings and holds much more than expected. The great thing is it is much more sturdy than those other mesh curtain hangers and doesn't sag like others.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Useful storage for medications/throat lozenges etc
customer_reviews.text: I hung mine inside my small bathroom closet door. It is narrow enough to not interfere with the doorknob. Mine holds all the things we could never manage to find on the closet shelves...aspirin/ibuprofen/acetaminophen, Tums, spare toothbrushes, all the throat lozenges that seem to be everywhere when you don't one and no place to be found when you do so more are purchased, bandaids, thermometers, and the list goes on. We skipped the hooks and found screws to secure the holes edges tightly inside the closet door and small tacks for the bottom to keep it from swinging.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great shower organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, durable and holds a lot without tearing.only problem is that the bottom stays growing mold after 3-5 months of hanging it in the shower. I put it on the shower hooks, no suction cups. The mold grosses me out but it's only on the bottom pockets that somehow don't fully dry like the upper pouches. I've had it two years now and need to replace it (only because of the mold). It really holds a lot! I keep toothbrushes, toothpaste, Shaver, shaving cream, facial cleanser, exfoliate, foot cream...
customer_reviews.author: L Wein

customer_reviews.title: A+ shower organization
customer_reviews.text: My shower has never been so organized!! I love this thing, it fits behind the shower curtain even when open and the mesh means the drainage is great. The mesh is sturdy. I've got shampoo, conditioner, dog shampoo, dog conditioner, toothbrush and toothpaste, razor, a huge bottle of body wash, a facial scrub, and a large mouthwash in there and it's not even straining. Super easy to clean, too. Very nice, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I'll never travel without this again!
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a cruise and it is a huge help with make-up, skin products, mirrors, brushes etc. I had everything separated, hanging on the bathroom door, organized and easy to find! It is such a big help. No matter where we go, the ladies never have enough counter space!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower caddy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hoping this would work in our shower to store all my shower products because there is literally no shelves in our bathroom. This was a godsend! Absolutely love it. Stores your shampoo,conditioner, razor, face and body wash, scrubber and whatever else u can think of. I hooked mine to my shower curtain hooks instead of the metal hooks it came with. Very good quality and even with everything in it it's not stretched and/or feels like it will tear. Quality was really well. Will always order this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RV /Travel  Trailer  Space Saver!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this in our travel trailer. I love the mesh as it does not snag like most others! It holds a lot of items & still hangs flat. I would surely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer for our tent trailer!
customer_reviews.text: We got this to use in our tent trailer, to help us keep track of things. It is well made, has numerous pockets of varying size to fit toothbrushes and paste, kindles, IPhones, brushes, lotions, bug spray, glasses, flashlight. Such a versatile product. We exchanged the hooks that came with it to shower curtain rings that have rolling balls on them so that it is easily moved along the support poles. Great product! We are ordering another for use beside the other bed. Go for it...you'll be happy you did!
customer_reviews.author: BeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Helps organize!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this hanging organizer! It fits everything we need and keeps it off the shower floor. The four big pockets on the bottom and middle rows fit two of my bottles. My only complaint is that the hooks sometimes come off the bar when we open the shower curtain but only ever one of them at a time and the whole thing has never totally fallen down. This is a super minor issue and I’ve just adjusted to being less aggressive when opening the shower curtain. Great buy! I would totally buy again! Three bottles on the bottom are 5-6” tall for reference
customer_reviews.author: Emelia

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: One of the pockets ripped the first time I put something in it. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Makes shower look so much better.
customer_reviews.text: I hate a shower head caddy so thought I would try this. The hooks did not fit over my shower doors so a bought a small curtain rod and hung it opposite of shower head and it looks great and makes cleaning so much easier. I’m doing this in guest bath also.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for RV's!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Bought it for my camper so I would not have to put items away everytime we moved to different campgrounds. It is perfect. Sturdy and difgerent size pockets dor all bottles, soap, razors, etc. The material it is made of is great and the seams are sewn so well there has been absolutely no ripping and the best part...no mold. I have used it for the last month of traveling and am very glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: k. play

customer_reviews.title: Holds a Lot!
customer_reviews.text: I needed storage for my grandma's weird shower, which has 0 shelves, and the shower head comes out directly from the ceiling, not the wall, so you can't hang a storage basket off it. I was gonna buy shelves w/ adhesive at first, but then I found this for only 8 bucks. Perfect, holds a lot. I also got one for my closet door. For each "installation" I only needed 2 of the 3 hooks, so I used the 2 spare hooks from the 2 sets for other stuff. 16 bucks on 2 went a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Fulfills Its Role Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is intended for. It comes with hooks, but I personally just hung it on the shower curtain loops that we already had up and it worked just fine. It is pretty narrow, but fits multiple items easily. I've attached a photo for reference. I love how much space it cleared up in the shower, and my husband loves that my products aren't scattered everywhere any more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our camper!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this! It holds a lot and the pockets hold up and don't sag. I used a tension rod going from our medicine cabinet to the wall and hung it from the rod. It's narrow enough that it doesn't take up a lot of room in the already small shower. Love the 2 razor holders. Now I don't have to worry about my shampoo and conditioner bottles falling off the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: This is great, I only wish I had purchased it earlier! My shower curtain rod is attached securely to the wall with screws, so this works well. I’m not sure how well it will work if you have a suspension rod.
customer_reviews.author: ATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is so great! Hangs on the curtain rod so no fuss with keeping suction cups on the wall or anything. The material is a soft plastic or nylon like mesh so no water can pool anywhere. My husband and i have ALOT of products in the shower and they all fit. It has small pockets for shavers along with very large pockets for the huge pump shampoo bottles. I also like that you cannot see it when the curtain is pulled back. It makes the tub look much more sleek and clean with no clutter! I will never go with out this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Lynn Herr

customer_reviews.title: Hooks badly designed but item has lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the RV. Used bathroom command hooks to place on RV shower walls. Plenty of pockets for all toiletries and I could transport it to the community bathhouse if needed. Wish the hooks it came with were better designed as they are clunky and would not stay connected if moving it to another location. Three swivel metal hanger hooks would have worked better.
customer_reviews.author: lisap

customer_reviews.title: Does not have rounded hook for hanging on shower curtain rod, only hangs with square top hook
customer_reviews.text: I really love this the only reason I took off a star is because the hooks I got were not what I saw in the photos. The photos showed a hook that is square that goes over the door on one side and one that is rounded on the other side for going over the shower curtain rod. The hooks I got are square on one side and the other side is too small to hook over the curtain so I was only able to use the square door part to hang over my round curtain rod so it's not as smooth as it would have been with a rounded top on the hook. Otherwise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: loretta gentle

customer_reviews.title: Good gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift I got for someone and then quarantine hit. I got it out to look at it out of boredom. It looks like it'll do a good job. It's like a mess material. I'm sure this could easily be washed if there was any kind of molding. I know that this would be super helpful for someone who has a lot of products with little shelf space.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolololol

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The Hanging Mesh Pockets do a great job of storing items in the pockets and feels very sturdy. It hangs perfectly using the shower curtain rings. I purchased 2 with 1 being hung by the hooks and the other by the curtain rings. I prefer using the hooks but only received one set of hooks. Great products minus the missing pieces. Edit- I received the hooks shortly after and got great follow up from the seller to ensure everything was as it should be. One of my best purchases on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kraig Russell

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much, I just reordered as a gift. All of my shower products are in this, with room to spare for my husband's items. I buy special bar soap. This lets it drain dry and not turn to mush. I have it hung directly on our shower rod hooks - it works perfectly! Quality construction also.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN K.

customer_reviews.title: First one flawed, replaced by Misslo, all others are excellent
customer_reviews.text: 7/29/16: I like the product, so much so that after I set up the first one I bought 2 or 3 more, which will have arrived today (I'm living on a semi truck). I've had this first one up for about 1.5 weeks, & one of the least-used pockets seems to have been poorly stitched. I'm hoping that a whip-stitch with plain thread will do the trick, but I'm worried that it will have to wait for now, & that it might get worse. 3 stars. Edit 9/16/2016: I have been gifted with an un-asked-for replacement! I'm grateful & will switch out the other as it is indeed getting worse. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Great way to declutter your bath
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a while now and still love it. we have a small bathroom so space is very important. this helps declutter the bath and holds my large shampoo/conditioner, bodywash, face wash, razors, body soap, all in one place! plus keeps it out of reach of the kids! I don't feel like it's gonig to tear or break from what I have in it and the mesh pockets help so If soap spills in it I just rinse it out and no mold because the holes let it drip dry! will buy another when we re-do our other bathroom for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pros (+) vs Cons (-)
customer_reviews.text: I have had this about a month now, hanging in my shower. Will update if it falls apart or gets moldy in an unreasonable period of time. + Appears & works exactly as advertised + Saves a lot of space; holds many items + Good quality + Great price ($7.99) - Missing a hook (only two came with the package) +++ Emailed Misslo, customer service rep (Season) promptly responded to resolve this issue. Season followed up very soon after just to make sure I received the hooks & that I was happy. My experience with customer service was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like how suction power is an option to rate because it doesn't have suction cups lol the only thing I'm not a fan of is the hooks. They work fine, I just feel like if I bump into it or something it'll fall. I just used rings to put it on the curtain rod. Otherwise pretty great. Good size, different pocket sizes for different items, washes easily, dries fast.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Cinea

customer_reviews.title: BEST Hanging Organizer I've Purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Item as described & already put to use. Works well hanging over closet door holding many bathroom products keeping them close at hand, neatly organized, and feels very sturdy. No offensive odors from material as noticed with similar items that must be aired out a few weeks before can be used. Easily can see many uses for this organizer like putting child's toys in it for quick pick up, grab & go, keeping those little cars & other small toys from getting under foot. Fits well over the door hanging straight & steadily. Could also hang on closet bar or stick on wall with those self-sticking, eastpysiery release hooks. Would highly recommend. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MickeylynTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Necessary addition!
customer_reviews.text: I have a clawfoot tub so I do not have any shelving/ledge. This was so necessary and very convenient. I put all of my hair products, shaving products, soap etc in this. The only issue is that when i need to pump my hair products, I take them out so as not to put too much pressure on the hooks/rods its attached to. Otherwise it is very nice storage
customer_reviews.author: Travelbug23

customer_reviews.title: Perfect space-saving bathroom makeup organizer!
customer_reviews.text: My apartment is teeny, and I own a s***load of makeup. The only place that makes sense for me to get ready is the bathroom, but there is just not enough space to keep it on the counter or on a shelf in there... which is where this thing comes in. I hung it over my bathroom door and use it to store only the makeup (and hair clips, headbands, bobby pins, etc.) that I use on a regular or semi-regular basis—the rest of the collection lives in a small trunk under my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does its job, nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: I got this pretty cheap, and it has simple metal hooks that come with it. It holds my heavy shampoo, conditioner, body wash, loofa, and such with no complaints. Has a couple loose threads, but that doesn't seem to affect its functionality. I use it inside my shower, but not where it moves with any curtain, so I have no experience from that to share. Hasn't changed colors or anything in the few months I've had it.
customer_reviews.author: Rylee Buylee

customer_reviews.title: Great for cramped showers!
customer_reviews.text: So, this thing has three holes where I guess you can hook onto your shower curtain, but I actually got command strips that can hold 10 pounds and put it on my shower wall. I LOVE that this thing can just hang on the shower wall wherever works for me, where right at my eye level are all of my necessities. I recommend getting some hooks along with this!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Ordered again!
customer_reviews.text: Since our first order worked out so well on our shower door, I decided that these pockets would do well in my art "studio" (which to the untrained eye looks more like one small corner of the sewing room). Lacking enough space to put my brushes and other such, I am hanging the pockets on the wall to get all these little items off my working space. As usual, good quality material, including industrial strength hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase and only because one of the pockets tore which I can't blame the manufacturer because I packed this thing up with all my toiletry needs. So I ordered another one to freshen up my bathroom but all in all its hold a lot and is durable I will keep purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Nacia

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to those metal shower organizers
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It has plenty of pockets for shampoo, conditioner, body wash, etc. It even has 2 pockets for your razor. It's easy to clean. I use an activated charcoal soap that leaves behind awful black residue. I was able to take the organizer off and throw it in the washer to clean it up without any issues. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to typical shower head holders
customer_reviews.text: I have it hanging over a towel bar in my shower. The hose for the removable shower head makes a regular shower holder difficult to use, I really like having my stuff at the rear of the shower where it doesn’t all get soaked every time. It would also work on a shower door but I wouldn’t recommend it for a shower rod
customer_reviews.author: apalmer

customer_reviews.title: Excellant organizer
customer_reviews.text: The mesh is heavy. the seams are excellent, and there's tons of space. I have this loaded up with soaps, shampoos, conditioners, lotions, shaving creams, razors... All the things that were cluttering up the tub ledges. I've got quite a bit of weight in it. I didn't use the hooks provided, instead I put it on the shower curtain hooks. If you're going to do this you'll want to place it on the side of the curtain that does the least moving.
customer_reviews.author: Tsennya

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 year
customer_reviews.text: So I've liked this shower organizer but it only lasted a year hanging on the shower side of the curtain. The threads have come loose and it's kind of a mess. It was only $8 when I bought it so can't complain much. I want to find something more durable, but not sure that exists.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: I really like this and did not receive it at a discount
customer_reviews.text: I DID NOT receive this item at a discount. I wasn't sure if I would like this hanging from my shower rod but turns out I really find it convenient. I like it a lot more than the over-the-showerhead caddy it replaced. I used the shower curtain hooks to hang it and not the hooks provided. I have 28 oz shampoo and conditioner, cleansing conditioner, razor, facial cleanser, bodywash and regular soap in it and there is room for more.This mesh pocket holder is very well made and hangs nicely out of the way. No more bottles sitting on the tub edges getting gross underneath from staying wet. I will be ordering another one for my second shower.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected but great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because there are no shelves in my shower that I share with a 12-year-old... Seeing as he never throws away his empty soap bottles or gives me space for my items I bought this! It holds every bit of my items except my bar soap. I've had it for roughly a month and there's no mold, soap scum or anything nasty built up on to it! It keeps bottles off the small sides of the shower or small shelves. No more am I knocking into this or having to clean soap rings from it.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Does not drain well - mildew issues
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for almost a year now and while it was great in the beginning, in the last 6+ months it has become a hassle. We started noticing immediately that the bottom doesn't drain very well, even though it is mostly mesh. It is hung in an area that is not in direct spray of the shower, so it only gets wet when we reach for whatever is stored. Because the water collects under whatever bottles we have in the bottom pouches, we have had constant mildew issues. It could be a great product if we weren't constantly having to scrub mildew out of the mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great Space Saving Item for an RV
customer_reviews.text: This is a great space saving product to use in an RV shower. It holds all my shower items and allows the water to drain out. I don't have to fumble around for my soap or shampoo on the floor or worry about items slipping off the small bathroom ledges. The mesh pockets hold my items securely.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without it?!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shower organizer! We just bought a 100 yr old farmhouse and there are no fancy built in shelves or cubbies to put all your showering necessities so I thought “what could it hurt to purchase?!” Seriously this thing is a life changer! It holds ALL of my stuff and even my husband’s few items. I can’t believe I ever lived without it! Easy to assemble and voila your storage problem in the shower solved.
customer_reviews.author: OBgirl

customer_reviews.title: I like that I can put my shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This product has exceeded my expectations. It is high quality, heavy duty mesh. It hangs on my shower rod without disrupting my shower curtain. I like that I can put my shampoo, soap, and razor in it and still have room for other things. It can easily be washed and hung back in place. The hooks are squared on one side (over the door) and curved on the other side (curtain rod). I bent the square side in to make a triangle to keep it on the hooks better, but that was my only "fix". I will be ordering more for my pantry and craft room :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Neat and versatile. Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Works well in my shower. I chose to hang it from a second tension shower curtain rod that I installed on the back wall side of the shower stall opposite the curtain up near the top and it hangs perfectly to allow for easy accessibility and storage. The material is well made and neat looking. Holds a lot and has several different sized pockets for various objects from large shampoo bottles on bottom to skinny pockets for razors and toothbrushes on top. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: f-ing love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: best thing i bought in long time wohoo such great quality easy to keep clean it looks good and it has great storage everybody should have one of these its way better then the metal caddy cuz they rust and dont have enough storage and stuff falls over they just suck.....this one is cheap and so awesome in every way and nothing falls over nothing rust.
customer_reviews.author: Cici,SwHTx77074

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This will fit over a door only not a shower rod. Poorly designed. Clangs against door.Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Bonnieblue

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy organizer
customer_reviews.text: It holds weight evenly with the provided hooks that go over the shower curtain rod. My plan is to eventually get one of their larger sized organizers, so I can declutter more of my soaps and lotions in the small mobile home where I now live.
customer_reviews.author: Katlady

customer_reviews.title: I would love to have one that was just the size of ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to hold spices on a very narrow pantry door. I will probably buy a second one to hang underneath and will use command holders for the second one. The over the door hooks are just right in thickness, so they actually let the door close without any difficulty. Very versatile. I would love to have one that was just the size of the first row of pockets since I am using it "off label". However, I was just glad to find it and the price was reasonable since it had been marked down. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. It is very accommodating for large bars of soap, bottles of body wash, shampoo and other washing paraphernalia. The soaps dry quickly and do not leave a sticky residue. I have this where it can drip directly into the tub and it hangs on a towel rack. It is fairly heavy with the various soaps and bottles but the hooks that are attached are strong enough to support. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Candylady987

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this product; I have an apartment shower with only one small half round attached shelf. I had a hanging pocket holder which was droopy and much smaller. This Misslo Hanging Mesh Pockets holder is just right to hold my shampoo, conditioner, hair clip, nail brush, etc. I hung it from my existing shower curtain hooks in the rear area. This way it does not get wet and I can also store my hair turban and washcloth in its pockets. It is a very nice stiff mesh and yes, I did machine wash it before using.
customer_reviews.author: BUMPSEY

customer_reviews.title: Well made, multifunctional, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: The pouch holds quite a few bath related items, but could easily be used on the other side of your bedroom or closet door to organize personal effects. It is durable and well stitched, the hooks aren't attached, and you can swap them out for other hooks for a different design aesthetic, if you wish. The material is easily cleaned, a nice perk.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Complete Waste
customer_reviews.text: The product does not stay in place. Keeps falling down and getting in the way. Complete waste of money and was not allowed to return it. Would be nice if it stayed in place, but unfortunately that's only wishful thinking.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Love

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and works well
customer_reviews.text: Uses hooks over the edge of the bath to hang. Holds very well, I have had no issues with the pockets becoming gradually looser as time goes on. Does not have elastic on the pockets. The mesh material keeps water from getting stuck in the pockets. Very effective
customer_reviews.author: IMCA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shower Storage Bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for shower in our motor home. Super strong material. Has big pockets to handle full bottles of hair care supplies. It even has a smaller pocket which fits a razor nicely. Nice strong hooks that are flat, not rounded. No more bottles of shampoo on floor of shower rolling around. Buy it-you will not be disappointed. Delivery was speedy and it arrived in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: VilleChick

customer_reviews.title: deff worth buying!!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for our rv shower and its perfect! i hung iton the shower hooks because we have a texture shower wall and nothing sticks to it! this is a tighter mesh-like material and it dries very quickly! it holds ALOT! i love this and would definity buy again but its holding strong and i think it will withstand alot!! it seems like it will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: just jess

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Storage Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our motorhome bathroom shower unit. Good storage and seems to be constructed properly to last. We used the suction cups to secure it to the shower glass unit. It comes with metal holders for overtop of a shower door bar however, the width of the holders weren't wide enough to fit for our shower unit.
customer_reviews.author: Eboat

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste Your $
customer_reviews.text: The idea seemed good. This mesh organizer has flimsy hooks. Quality is not great.
customer_reviews.author: Calk

customer_reviews.title: Much Smaller Overalls than Anticipated
customer_reviews.text: While some pockets were deep enough to hold shampoo bottles, etc. the overall size of this item is small. Looks like a postage stamp hanging on the door due to its small size. It's too early to determine whether it will last in the long run. But hey, it's additional storage in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: ActiveShopperGal

customer_reviews.title: This product is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Look no further, this product is the best! It has a high quality mesh as described and is very easy to keep clean. It stores everything I need in our RV shower. The company is pleasant to deal with too. I am completely satisfied and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ADK Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and exactly what I needed. The material is strong and has not ripped in the 6 months I've had it. It dries quickly because it is mesh and doesn't get mildewed. It is a good size, the bigger pockets are large enough to hold the big 34oz body wash bottles, the smallest pockets on the top perfectly hold disposable razors. This holds a lot of atuff5, pretty much all of the shower supplies between my husband and I fit in here
customer_reviews.author: melissa oberdorf

customer_reviews.title: Much better quality material than others!
customer_reviews.text: My mesh shower organizer had seen better days so I had to order a new one. This one is SO much better than my other one. The material is much nicer and the corners of the shampoo bottles don't get stuck in this one like they did the other one because it's a different material. It hangs on the shower easily with the three included hooks and the storage pockets work for both my husband and me to store all of our shower products away from children.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material, made well
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time (❤️Prime!) and I’m very pleased so far with the product. The material is good quality, the stitching is well done (very important) and cleans nicely. The pockets are a good size. The smalls are great for misc items (razor, combs) the large are holding 2 full size slim design bottles perfectly. I have a very narrow tub and this is a great space saver item.
customer_reviews.author: bsgsd13

customer_reviews.title: Cruise Worthy, Travel Worthy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use for a cruise with the purpose of hanging it up near the cabin shower to hold shampoo, conditioner, lotions, nail files, small foot brush, and much more. Mesh, so it very quickly drys. Varied sized pockets enough to hold large shampoo and small nail files. Comes with three metal over the rod or door holders. All in all this worked perfectly. It folded up nicely so it didn't take up space in luggage. Very happy I got this and will use it again for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Ana M.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: We use this on the inside of our shower curtain. With 3 kids using the shower with all different needs (if you're a curly girl you will understand!) it has definitely come in handy. Fewer bottles of products left all over the bathroom & within arms reach of the baby or toddler hands that shouldn't be touching it. Very durable & hasn't broken down yet after multiple months of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Your hooks are lame !
customer_reviews.text: The bag is nice ... the ‘hooks’ need a little more work . I bent mine a little so they actually hang on the bar right . I’m probably gonna get some s hooks or more shower curtain hooks to to rehang . Either or I could of probably found the same thing at five below.
customer_reviews.author: YRN-AP

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine hung up for a couple months in my shower and it's still holding strong. I actually have the pump style TRESemme shampoo and conditioner plus a pump style big bottle of body wash, and it's still holding strong
customer_reviews.author: Red Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Holds all our shower stuff out of the reach of a curious toddler and we're not having any problems with the bottles leaning into
customer_reviews.text: We've been using it for several day now. Holds all our shower stuff out of the reach of a curious toddler and we're not having any problems with the bottles leaning into the tub space - the pockets hold it pretty securely. Feels sturdy enough. I'm not a huge fan of the hooks it comes with because they are round on one side and square on the other. Not sure who has a square shower rod - the rivets aren't square, but they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent storage
customer_reviews.text: Our corner organizer was starting to rust, I wanted something easy for the kids to get their items out of and hoping they would put them back. This has been hanging IN my shower for 2 weeks and I am very pleased. I started with one but quickly bought another when I realized how great this product was!
customer_reviews.author: Jes Mayne

customer_reviews.title: Add all of the extra stuff into your shower out of the way
customer_reviews.text: I am able to add all of my extras in the shower using this shower organizer. I hooked it on to my shower curtain hooks so it opens and closes easily without having to adjust the extra hooks that came with it. Very good quality and am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Super handy
customer_reviews.text: This is handy . The hooks are to large for shower rod . But, you can use existing shower curtain rings that hold your shower curtain. Keep things at eye level especially in a small shower saving room
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase this hanging mesh storage for my RV after reading a few of the reviews stating it was perfect for the RV. It arrived ontime as stated in my e-mail. No issues with packaging. My husband was able to hang on shower curtain as stated. It fits perfectly in the small shower without obstruction while taking a shower. Thanks also to the seller for following up on making sure I was satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karadok01

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my bottles my razors and you can even hang lufas on the hooks. I live that it comes wy the hooks. Very sturdy and very nice design. Inside the shower so no one else sees it. Prefer this over a rack that hangs on the shower head!
customer_reviews.author: Mommab

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small shower space
customer_reviews.text: Durable and functional! I use it in the shower to hold my liter shampoo bottles and body washes and it hasn’t budged. No rips or issues. Great for small shower spaces. Just be aware of what size bottles you have because this only holds 2 liter bottles on the bottom and the rest of the pockets hold standard body washes and shampoo sizes. The 3 hooks are nice to balance the weight out.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna Maue

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The mesh is high quality and holds my shampoo bottles perfectly in the shower. My only complain is that I wish the hooks were more circular and less boxy. I understand that this is to help them fit better over a door or a shower door, but it would be great to have an option, maybe?
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the most part just be mindful.
customer_reviews.text: You'll have to replace this frequently or plan on not filling it with more heavier things because the mesh breaks from the liner at the bottom of the pockets quite easily. Only two pockets tore and those were within the first two months. We've had it for 6-7 months now even with those tears and it still works. I've tried to mend the tears but since it's a mesh fabric, there's not much you can really do. Good for the most part just be mindful.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: the price and availability
customer_reviews.text: I liked the storage ability. I did not like the hooks for hanging the organizer. When I opened and closed the shower curtain the hooks except the middle one loosened and came off
customer_reviews.author: lynn buri

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to hang on the shower rod, and it had a place for everything. I love it. I have a shower caddy that fits over the showerhead, but it is too high for me to reach easily. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Slover

customer_reviews.title: Traveller's best friend for much more than shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these; one for myself and one for a friend. We are using them on a cruise ship, as we have found that they make storing and finding things so much easier. We use them for make-up, jewelry, socks, meds, and many other small items. It saves a lot of time and space.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi-in-NYC!

customer_reviews.title: Great little shower caddy!! Get one!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews but I really like this little thing! It’s great, sturdy material but not that cheap mesh and water goes right through it! It has hooks instead of full round clips so I am able to hang it from my shower door. It is rather small and I wish it had a loop or something at the bottom for me to hang a washcloth from but I could do that really easily... Overall, I love this shower caddy! I’ve had it for 3-4 months and it has NO signs of mold or mildew!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and meets all my needs
customer_reviews.text: This product is made very nicely. I have had these before where they are just mesh and don't last very long. This one is made out of a mesh material, but it doesn't have big holes and the material seems much more sturdy. I also like how it has different size pockets. In addition, it came with the hooks which was a nice bonus. It held everything I needed it to hold and I still have room left. I am quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! My teen daughter has tons of shower products so we hung this on the inside of her shower and it holds all of her stuff without it being visible on the outside. Seems sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: MamaMo

customer_reviews.title: Great fix for space in shower!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this! I didnt have to use the hooks, bcninused what I have for my curtain. The only thing I wish this had was more larger pockets, instead of small ones. I use it for big bottles :) Would suggest for others!
customer_reviews.author: Jayce

customer_reviews.title: Are you thinking about it? Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Well I never thought I'd be reviewing bathroom accessories but here i am! This whole this is stinking strong!!! I've been using it for months! No rips, no frays, no discoloration, no mildew! I'm really weird about water gathering around stuff and this puts my mind to ease! 10 outta 10!
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Great for organization
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I finally found this. This works perfect for our bathtub/shower. Doesn’t take up much room and it has plenty of pockets! No more containers (that constantly fall down) sitting on the side of the tub 🛁
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey T.

customer_reviews.title: the hooks aren't compatible with a shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for us. I expected it to move with the shower curtain, but it just kept getting tangled with the curtain hooks. Did not slide easily when the shower curtain was opened. It ended up just being in the way. Will be returning. it might work well if you hung it on one side and only got into the shower on the other side but with kids, we use both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

product_meta.title: Misslo Hanging Mesh Pockets Hold 340oz/1000ml Shampoo Shower Organizer with Over the Door Hooks
feature_bullets: Travel shower caddy has 4 large mesh pockets each hold 34oz / 1000ml shampoo, 4 smaller pockets, quick drying and breathable;
Rust proof metal grommets, 3 metal over the door hooks included for this hanging bathroom organizer;
Shower storage also can use your existing shower hooks onto your existing shower curtain / liner;
Holds Toiletries, hair dryer, shampoo, conditioner, or other personal care items;
Wipe with a damp cloth or wash by hand.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,759 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
